response.headline: Taiwanese shaved ice machine at TropiTai in Denver creating fluffy white dessert
response.summary: TropiTai Shaved Ice serves Taiwanese-style shaved ice at 98 Wadsworth Blvd Unit 122, Denver, CO 80226. The machine creates extremely fine, fluffy white ice that resembles cotton or snow.

image_details.key_interest: The extremely fine, cotton-like texture of the Taiwanese shaved ice
